response.job_title: Sales Manager at Gebr. Pfeiffer, Inc.
response.skills: Visual Basic, Aspen Plus, Aspen HYSYS, CAPCOST, Microsoft Excel, Engineering, Microsoft Office, Chemical Engineering, Thermodynamics, Research, Project Management, Gas, Chemistry, Data Analysis, Heat Transfer, Biofuels, Spanish, C, AutoCAD, Characterization

profile_positions.description: In my research I studied reactivity via photo oxidation of alkanes and carbonilic compounds in the presence of heterogeneous catalysts, leading to the formation of more valuable products with great potential as monomers for the polymer industry. I achieve this by testing different catalysts in a liquid phase reactor, processing kinetic data, and applying different catalyst characterization techniques such as FTIR, TGA, BET, XRD, UV-VIS, and TEM to relate their structure, synthesis process, and properties. I also designed, constructed, and prepared the process instrument diagram (P&ID) of the photocatalytic reactor. This experience as a graduate research assistant has allowed me to achieve strong time management skills that enable on-time project delivery. I have been able to multitask and prioritize my responsibilities, and also to work in teams and collaborate effectively.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: During my internship at Quest Consultants, Inc I had the opportunity to apply my knowledge especially in thermodynamics. I wrote an algorithm in Excel VBA that calculates the thermodynamic properties of hundreds of pure substances using exclusively the Peng Robinson EOS. For comparison purposes, I used process simulators such as ProMax and Aspen Plus. This internship contributed a lot to my personal growth, I learned how to work effectively in a fast-paced and new environment but also to take the initiative and drive for results.
profile_positions.title: Process Safety Intern

company.name: Gebr. Pfeiffer
company.description:
Gebr. Pfeiffer has a long and successful tradition of providing the highest level of quality and service. In a rapidly changing environment, the company remains focussed on the individual requirements of its international customers. Thanks to its commitment to these standards, Gebr. Pfeiffer and its staff will continue to shape the future of processing technology.
  
Since its foundation in 1864, the business has fostered a culture of innovation and technical excellence. By developing specialist equipment for grinding, drying, separating, hydrating and calcining applications, the company has made major contributions to the progress of processing technology.
  
State-of-the-art design and manufacturing facilities, complemented by a pilot station, complete with the latest technology, are the key to our success. This is backed by years of experience and in-depth expertise in the fields of cement, lime, gypsum and ceramics and by outstanding technical workmanship, enabling us to offer an extensive range of leading-edge products.
 
We at Gebr. Pfeiffer are dedicated to developing innovative, tailored solutions and work together closely with our customers to build a lasting relationship. The technological progress incorporated in our products and their superior quality ensure years of efficient and reliable service.
